1.Pros: love the job! great atomsphere and lots of options to grow!
1.Cons: Lots of people. Sometimes don't get enough hours. Managers don't always do what s best for the company

3.Pros: Fun place to work. Everyday is different

7.Cons: It's very hard and demanding job dealing with the public can be difficult. The hours can be up to 50 hours a week and you usually have to always work holidays.

8.Pros: Very flexible hours, Simple work, Learn to work under pressure

9.Pros: Easy to get hiredManagers were fair and helped when necessaryEasy to get started and learn at your own pace on the jobFree meal during each shift
9.Cons: Consistently had to work the late shift due to being older than 18Overall immature/difficult coworkersStressful when busy, boring when slowDifficult, entitled customersCoworkers who smoke get more breaks than those who don't
